analysis.key_quote: I urge OPM in the strongest possible terms: Reject these proposals in full. Uphold your duty to protect the nonpartisan, merit-based civil service system.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the dismantling of federal employee benefits, the politicization of hiring and firing, and the threat to the merit-based civil service system, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
